name: Nature Preserve
uniques: Constructing it will take over the tiles around it and assign them to your closest city

name: Sacred Lake
uniques: [+2 Culture, +2 Faith] for each adjacent [City center]
[+1 Food] from [Fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Civil Service]>
Cannot be built on [Hill] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Sacred Lake] tiles>

name: Geoglyph
uniques: [+1 Faith, +1 Culture] for each adjacent [Holy Site]
[+1 Gold, +1 Culture] for each adjacent [Customs House]

name: Batey
uniques: Can only be built on [Open terrain] tiles
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Batey] tiles>

name: Timber Circle
uniques: Cannot be built on [Hill] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Timber Circle] tiles>

name: Sinu Canal
uniques: Can only be built on [Fresh Water] tiles
Can only be built on [Open terrain] tiles
[+1 Production] for each adjacent [Pasture] <after discovering [Horseback Riding]>

name: Colossal Head
uniques: [+2 Science] for each adjacent [Great Improvement] <after discovering [Astronomy]>

civilopediaText.text: Avocados have a long history in Mexico, dating back to ancient times when they were cultivated by the Aztecs. The fruit held significant cultural and culinary importance, with its consumption being associated with vitality and fertility. Today, Mexico is one of the world's largest producers of avocados, and the fruit plays a central role in Mexican cuisine, particularly in dishes like guacamole. Avocados have become a symbol of Mexican identity and are deeply ingrained in the country's cultural heritage.

name: Mekewap
uniques: [+1 Gold] for each adjacent [Luxury Resource] <after discovering [Guilds]>

name: Oppidum
uniques: [+1 Production] for each adjacent [Strategic Resource] <after discovering [Industrialization]>
Cannot be built on [Grassland] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Oppidum] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Plains] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Oppidum] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Desert] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Oppidum] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Tundra] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Oppidum] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Snow] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Oppidum] tiles>

name: Water Shrine
uniques: [+1 Happiness, +1 Culture] for each adjacent [City Center]

name: Electronics Factory
uniques: [+1 Production] for each adjacent [Great Improvement] <after discovering [Industrialization]>
[+1 Culture, +1 Gold] <within [2] tiles of a [City center]> <after discovering [Electricity]>
